flawed_nl_solution:
The number of non-valuable files Brennan downloaded in the first round is 7/10*800 = <<7/10*800=560>>560 files.
The number of valuable files Brennan downloaded in the first round is 800-560 = <<800-560=240>>240
When he downloaded 400 new files, there were 3/5*400= <<3/5*400=420>>420 non-useful files, which he deleted again.
The total number of valuable files he downloaded in the second round is 400-420 = <<400-420=-20>>-20
To write his research, Brennan had -20+240 = <<-20+240=220>>220 useful files to reference to write his research.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 240, not 420. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
